TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit InCallService extends Android.App.Service

Docs.summary: Obtains the current phone call audio state.
Docs.value: An object encapsulating the audio state. Returns null if the service is not fully initialized.

Docs.summary: Obtains the current list of Calls to be displayed by this in-call service.
Docs.value: A list of the relevant Calls.
